attributes.action: Take into account personal responsibility as regarding health treatment on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Those who put themselves at higher risk of developing various ailments, such as lung cancer and emphysema from smoking, type two diabetes/high blood pressure etc from being grossly overweight, those who mutilate themselves through pointlessly dangerous endeavours and so forth, should be responsible, at least in some part, for the expense of their medical treatment related to those causes. 

The average member of the public should not be held financially responsible for the actions of those who do not help themselves. 

The NHS should be a body to help those genuinely deserving, in a world of limited resources, those who take more than their fair share should fend for themselves.
